Present location: BIBLIOTHECA ALEXANDRINA ANTIQUETIES MUSEUM [01/027] ALEXANDRIA BAAM
Name: Gold Ring with Dark Red Stone
Description: The gold ring consists of a thin rounded frame, where the upper middle part is wider and the ring narrows as it goes downward. A hollow in the upper part of the ring with wavy lines contains a dark red precious stone with some black veins, probably sardonyx, surrounded with an outer white frame. The ring probably was formed by hammering.
